LanguageData.RT_ZTZ88A_Vehicle.label: ZTZ88A
LanguageData.RT_ZTZ88A_Vehicle.description:
A 2nd generation MBT, equipped with an 120mm cannon and .50BMG machine gun, also with smoke launchers, added composite armor module in front.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x2，Commander x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
120mm（Main Cannon）
.50BMG（Support MG）
7.62x54mmR（Coaxial MG）
